mapper.select: select ec.id,ec.title,ec.cover,ec.lesson_num,es1.title as subjectLevelOne, es2.title as subjectLevelTwo,et.name as teacherName,ec.price,ecd.description from edu_course ec left join edu_course_description ecd on ec.id = ecd.id left join edu_teacher et on ec.teacher_id = et.id left join edu_subject es1 on ec.subject_parent_id = es1.id left join edu_subject es2 on ec.subject_id = es2.id where ec.id = #{id}
